import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './registration.css'; // Ensure this path is correct const RegistrationForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ room: '', sector: '', feePerMonth: '', foodChoice: '', stayFrom: '', duration: '', course: '', registrationNo: '', firstName: '', middleName: '', lastName: '', gender: '', contact: '', email: '', emergencyContact: '', guardianName: '', guardianRelation: '', guardianContact: '', correspondenceAddress: '', correspondenceCity: '', correspondenceState: '', correspondencePincode: '', permanentSameAsCorrespondence: false, permanentAddress: '', permanentCity: '', permanentState: '', permanentPincode: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('/api/register', formData); alert('Registration successful!'); setFormData({ room: '', sector: '', feePerMonth: '', foodChoice: '', stayFrom: '', duration: '', course: '', registrationNo: '', firstName: '', middleName: '', lastName: '', gender: '', contact: '', email: '', emergencyContact: '', guardianName: '', guardianRelation: '', guardianContact: '', correspondenceAddress: '', correspondenceCity: '', correspondenceState: '', correspondencePincode: '', permanentSameAsCorrespondence: false, permanentAddress: '', permanentCity: '', permanentState: '', permanentPincode: '' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error registering:', error); alert('Registration failed. Please try again.'); } }; return (

); }; export default RegistrationForm;
